titleStmt.title: Londons ordinarie, or euery man in his humour To a pleasant new tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Iohn Wright dwelling neere the Old Baily,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Through the Royall Exchainge as I walked,".
In two parts, printed side by side.
Reproduction of original in the Pepysian Library, Magdalene College, Cambridge, England.
